--create topic testtopic;
create source test_source_1(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 tinyint,
    col2 int,
    col3 double,
    col4 decimal(10, 2),
    col5 varchar,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        "k.k0",
        "v.v1",
        "v.v2",
        "v.v3",
        "v.v4",
        "v.v5"
    )
    properties = (
        "prop1" = "val1",
        "prop2" = "val2"
    )
);
Ok

create materialized view test_mv_1 as select * from test_source_1;
Ok

select * from test_mv_1 order by col0;
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_1;

select * from test_mv_1 order by col0;
|1|100|1000|1234.432100|12345678.99|str1|
|2|200|2000|2234.432100|22345678.99|str2|
|3|300|3000|3234.432100|32345678.99|str3|
|4|400|4000|4234.432100|42345678.99|str4|
|5|500|5000|5234.432100|52345678.99|str5|
|6|600|6000|6234.432100|62345678.99|str6|
|7|700|7000|7234.432100|72345678.99|str7|
|8|800|8000|8234.432100|82345678.99|str8|
|9|900|9000|9234.432100|92345678.99|str9|
|10|1000|10000|10234.432100|93345678.99|str10|
10 rows returned

drop materialized view test_mv_1;
Ok
drop source test_source_1;
Ok

--delete topic testtopic;
